upgrade.0: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
upgrade.1: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 15% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
upgrade.2: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 18% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
upgrade.3: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 21% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
upgrade.4: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

upgrade.0: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升12%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
upgrade.1: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升15%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。

upgrade.4: 击败敌人后，攻击力提升24%，持续30秒。该效果至多叠加3层，每层持续时间独立。
